description: [``botocore``] Adding Claude 2.1 support to Bedrock Agents

[``botocore``] This release adds additional configurations for Query Session Context on the following APIs: GetUnfilteredTableMetadata, GetUnfilteredPartitionMetadata, GetUnfilteredPartitionsMetadata.
[``botocore``] This release adds additional configurations on GetTemporaryGlueTableCredentials for Query Session Context.
[``botocore``] This release adds the DescribeSourceMetadata API. This API can be used to view the stream information of the flow's source.

[``botocore``] CloudWatch Network Monitor is a new service within CloudWatch that will help network administrators and operators continuously monitor network performance metrics such as round-trip-time and packet loss between their AWS-hosted applications and their on-premises locations.
[``botocore``] Provides minor corrections and an updated description of APIs.
[``botocore``] Update endpoint-rules client to latest version
